Scripts.VariableScript: Declare @CriteriaSetCode varchar(200) Declare @TaskCode varchar(200) Declare @CriteriaSetCodeCategoryId bigint Declare @ProcessActionCodeCategoryId bigint Declare @ProcessTaskCodeCategoryId bigint Declare @CriteriaSetCodeId bigint Declare @CriteriaSetId bigint Declare @ProcessTaskCodeId bigint Declare @ActionCode varchar(200) Select @ProcessActionCodeCategoryId=[CodeCategoryId] From [{0}].[CodeCategory] Where [CategoryCode]='ProcessActionType' Select @CriteriaSetCodeCategoryId=[CodeCategoryId] From [{0}].[CodeCategory] Where [CategoryCode]='CriteriaSetType' Select @ProcessTaskCodeCategoryId=[CodeCategoryId] From [{0}].[CodeCategory] Where [CategoryCode]='ProcessTaskType' SET @CriteriaSetId=NULL
Scripts.EcScript:
SET @CriteriaSetCode='{0}'
if (not exists(select 1 from [{2}].[CodeDictionary] where CodeDictionaryCode=@CriteriaSetCode and CodeCategoryId=@CriteriaSetCodeCategoryId)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [{2}].[CodeDictionary]([CodeCategoryId],[CodeDictionaryCode],[Value],[ValueShort],[SequenceNo],[IsDidplayed]) VALUES(@CriteriaSetCodeCategoryId,@CriteriaSetCode,@CriteriaSetCode+' Form CashFlowStudio','',0,1) END
Set @CriteriaSetCodeId = (select {2}.GetDictionaryCodeID('CriteriaSetType',@CriteriaSetCode))
if(not exists(select 1 from [{2}].[CriteriaSet] where [CriteriaSetTypeId]=@CriteriaSetCodeId)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [{2}].[CriteriaSet]([CriteriaSetTypeId]) VALUES(@CriteriaSetCodeId) END
Set @CriteriaSetId=(select top 1 CriteriaSetId From [{2}].[CriteriaSet] Where CriteriaSetTypeId=@CriteriaSetCodeId)
if(not exists(select 1 from [{2}].[Criteria] where [CriteriaSetId]=@CriteriaSetId and [CriteriaTypeId]=@CriteriaSetCodeId)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [{2}].[Criteria] ([CriteriaName] ,[CriteriaDescription] ,[CriteriaSetId] ,[CriteriaTypeId] ,[IsEnable] ,[ECPassNo] ,[XMLSqlQueryEC] ,[SequenceNo] ,[IsFunctionEnable] ,[IsEditable]) VALUES(@CriteriaSetCode, @CriteriaSetCode + ' From CashFlowStudio', @CriteriaSetId, @CriteriaSetCodeId, 1, 232, N'{1}', 1, 1, 1 ) END ELSE BEGIN update [{2}].[Criteria] SET [XMLSqlQueryEC]=N'{1}' where [CriteriaSetId]=@CriteriaSetId and [CriteriaTypeId]=@CriteriaSetCodeId END
Scripts.TaskScript:
SET @TaskCode='{0}'
if (not exists(select 1 from [{2}].[CodeDictionary] where CodeDictionaryCode=@TaskCode and CodeCategoryId=@ProcessTaskCodeCategoryId)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [{2}].[CodeDictionary]([CodeCategoryId],[CodeDictionaryCode],[Value],[ValueShort],[SequenceNo],[IsDidplayed]) VALUES(@ProcessTaskCodeCategoryId,@TaskCode,@TaskCode+' Form CashFlowStudio','',0,1) END
Set @ProcessTaskCodeId = (select {2}.GetDictionaryCodeID('ProcessTaskType',@TaskCode))
if(exists(select 1 from [{2}].[ProcessTask] where [ProcessTaskCodeId]=@ProcessTaskCodeId)) BEGIN Update [{2}].[ProcessTask] set [XMLProcessTask]=N'{1}' ,[CriteriaSetId]=@CriteriaSetId where [ProcessTaskCodeId]=@ProcessTaskCodeId END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [{2}].[ProcessTask] ([ProcessTaskCodeId] ,[ProcessTaskDescription] ,[XMLProcessTask] ,[ProcessTaskFilePath] ,[IsCurrent] ,[VersionNumber] ,[FileCheckSum] ,[TaskType] ,[IsCheckOut] ,[CriteriaSetId]) VALUES (@ProcessTaskCodeId ,@TaskCode+' from cashflow studio UI' ,N'{1}' ,NULL ,1 ,NULL ,NULL ,'CashFlow' ,0 ,@CriteriaSetId) END DELETE FROM [{2}].[ProcessTaskArray] WHERE [ProcessTaskCodeId]=@ProcessTaskCodeId DELETE FROM [{2}].[ProcessTaskContext] where [ProcessTaskCodeId]=@ProcessTaskCodeId
Scripts.ActionSctipt: SET @ActionCode='{0}' if (not exists(select 1 from [{1}].[CodeDictionary] where CodeDictionaryCode=@ActionCode and CodeCategoryId=@ProcessActionCodeCategoryId)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [{1}].[CodeDictionary]([CodeCategoryId],[CodeDictionaryCode],[Value],[ValueShort],[SequenceNo],[IsDidplayed]) VALUES(@ProcessActionCodeCategoryId,@ActionCode,@ActionCode+' Form CashFlowStudio','',0,1) END
